downloadTitle: Service Encryption with Purview Customer Key
downloadDescription: Presentation from the Microsoft Exchange Community (MEC) Technical Airlift - September 13-14, 2022

downloadFile.name: Service Encryption with Purview Customer Key.pdf

detailsSection:
With Customer Key, you are in control of the root keys used to encrypt your data-at-rest in Microsoft 365. Customer Key enables organizations to meet the requirement of encrypting data using self-managed keys. In this session, we will share the latest capabilities of the service, and answer your queries.

Recording of presentation by Brijesh Desai is at https://youtu.be/g1J4v7U3l3o.
detailsSection_file_name: Service Encryption with Purview Customer Key.pdf
